#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
	ll a,b,z,c;
	ll t1=1,t2=2;
	scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
	while(1)
	{
		c=0;
	 if((a==0)&&(b==0))
 		{
 			break;
		}
		t1=1;
		t2=2;
		if((1>=a)&&(1<=b))
			c++;
		if((2>=a)&&(2<=b))
			c++;
		while(1)
		{
			z=t1+t2;
			t1=t2;
			t2=z;
			//("b=%lld\n",b);
			if((z>=a)&&(z<=b))
			
			{
				c++;
			}
			if(z>b)
				break;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",c);
scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
}
	return 0;
}
